attributes.action: emergency service to be available after 8pm at night till 8am in Gainsborough.
attributes.background: There is a minor injury's unit in gainsbrough from 8am till 8pm  there isn't any out of hours help and the out out hours service is only available in Lincoln and Scunthorpe and due too taxis not running 24hr its impossible too get there which leads too vunerbal and sick and in need having to wait.

rejection.details:
The UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for the issue you raise. Your local Clinical Commissioning Group is responsible for the provision of emergency health services. Lincolnshire West CCG is responsible for the Gainsborough area. You can contact them here: 

http://www.lincolnshirewestccg.nhs.uk/contact-us
